name: Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe
description:
Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe is an action, sports and arcade game developed by The Bitmap Brothers. It was originally released in 1990. It was published by Empire Interactive. Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe has a Metascore of 64, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe is available on Commodore / Amiga, SEGA Master System, Atari ST and Game Boy.
It was produced by Antoine Voisin (DS version), '''C64''': Micheal Merren and Michael Merren. David Leitch and Michael Merren directed the game. David Whittaker, Martin Walker, Martin Walker (Game Boy) and Matt Furniss scored the game.
